content.html:
it's harder to catch especially because joint_angle fills the console / buffer, but it is there if you look very hard (and fast! :-) ) as joint velocity transitions in/out of 3-3.3 rad/s range.

name: "joint_velocity"

    nsec: 255793632
  }
  paused: false
  iterations: 130163
}
data: "{\"state\":\"in_range\",\"joint\":\"my_joint\", \"position\":\"371.367715\", \"velocity\":\"3.288775\", \"force\":\"-141.389931\", \"range\":\"velocity\", \"min\":\"3.000000\", \"max\":\"3.300000\", \"value\":\"3.288775\", \"model\":\"revoluter\"}"
